formattedAddress: 160 Riverside Boulevard, Entrance on Freedom Place, New York, NY 10069, USA
adrFormatAddress: 160 Riverside Boulevard, Entrance on Freedom Place, New York, NY 10069, USA

editorialSummary.text: Local chain of doggy day-care centers also offering grooming & training services.

originalText.text: I recently started bringing my standard poodle puppy here, as it is conveniently located near my apartment and I was desperate to find a way for her to release some energy. Initially I thought it would be a once a week thing, as she was very shy at in the beginning. Now I can’t walk down the block without her pulling to go there !!! She has made the decision herself that biscuits and bath is a must as often as possible! Highly Recommend! The morning crew is also always so lovely.

text.text: I recently started bringing my standard poodle puppy here, as it is conveniently located near my apartment and I was desperate to find a way for her to release some energy. Initially I thought it would be a once a week thing, as she was very shy at in the beginning. Now I can’t walk down the block without her pulling to go there !!! She has made the decision herself that biscuits and bath is a must as often as possible! Highly Recommend! The morning crew is also always so lovely.

originalText.text:
Update on October 12th:

Since my original review I did have a concerning issue arise and I wanted to post that the store location manager, David Maher, heard my concerns and he put forth the effort to make sure my future bookings would result in a positive experience. I'm extremely impressed by the customer service. 10/10 would recommend!

My first time coming to Biscuits and Bath was on July 8th and I wanted to post a review to say the staff member Zhane went above and beyond.

I was in a pickle because my 7 month old puppy had an accident in her crate and I had a very big day ahead of me - I did not have the bandwidth to wash and dry her myself! Zhane was wonderful to speak to over the phone, and when I got to Biscuits and Bath I had forgotten my cell phone (it was one of THOSE days) and I couldn't show my puppy's proof of vaccinations - Zhane immediately put me at ease and called my vet for vaccine documentation.

I've only had my puppy for 3 weeks and I haven't left her with anyone else - based on my interaction with Zhane I felt comfortable that my puppy was in good hands. And oh my goodness, my little furball smelled and looked AMAZING after her bath and blowdry! She was in a happy mood, too.

Biscuits and Bath IS pricey and this service is not something I can afford on the regular. However, the location, convenience, and wonderful service made this experience absolutely worth it.

originalText.text: Dylan loves going to biscuits and bath. She jumps out of my car when we arrive and I know she is in good hands!!! Amazing place with amazing people who care about your dog like their own!

text.text: Dylan loves going to biscuits and bath. She jumps out of my car when we arrive and I know she is in good hands!!! Amazing place with amazing people who care about your dog like their own!

originalText.text: My dog loves going to Biscuits on Riverside- so much so that I walk a good bit out of my way to bring him for daycare when I go to work. The staff is so friendly, helpful and thoughtful, and I have peace of mind that my dog is in great hands having fun all day!

originalText.text: The service and staff here is great! I loved the ala carte grooming options and they shuttled my dog free of charge to her vet appointment.
